General Summary: This internship centers on the development of efficient large multimodal models (LMMs) designed for streaming environments and optimized for on-device deployment. The selected intern will contribute to advancing intelligent systems-such as chatbots and robotic agents-that can perceive, interpret, and interact with dynamic real-world contexts in real time. The project will emphasize both the multimodal comprehension capabilities of these models and their computational efficiency, enabling responsive and context-aware behavior in resource-constrained settings.
